item.title: $init super refactor
item.description: Aaaand we’re back with another heavy hitting round of super refactorization in Terraform! I think the first iteration of Super Router for AWS went well. It allowed us to peer and route both intra-region and cross-region TGWs and VPCs with a single module. But there was one really annoying flaw. The caveat in the design is that the peer TGWs will have to go through the Super Router’s local provider region to get to other peer TGWs.
